name: MonstersGame - Avoid wrong clicking
description: MonstersGame is a browser-based game from RedMoon Studios. This style help user to better identify page elements such as time-counter and speed-up-link for hunting activity.
additional_info: "Speed-up-link for hunting activity" is an useful feature but it costs drops of blood. MonstersGame default layout puts speed-up-link too narrow to "Continue" button, augmenting risk of unwanted mouse click. Changelog version 0.1 - Initial version versione 0.2 - Now it works for "Cemetary" countdown too.
